title: 行列2
question: ???に入るのはなに
source:
<color=#da70d6>#include</color> <color=#ce9178><stdio.h></color>

<color=#358cd6>int</color> main<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ffd700>)</color>
<color=#ffd700>{</color>
  <color=#358cd6>char</color> list<color=#ffd700>[</color>3<color=#ffd700>]</color><color=#ffd700>[</color>2<color=#ffd700>]</color>;
  <color=#c586c0>for</color><color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#358cd6>int</color> i=0; i<3; i++<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
    <color=#c586c0>for</color><color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#358cd6>int</color> j=0; j<2; j++<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
      list<color=#ffd700>[</color>i<color=#ffd700>]</color><color=#ffd700>[</color>j<color=#ffd700>]</color> = <color=#ce9178>'a'</color> + i*2 + j;
    <color=#ffd700>}</color>
  <color=#ffd700>}</color>
  list<color=#ffd700>[</color>2<color=#ffd700>]</color><color=#ffd700>[</color>1<color=#ffd700>]</color> = <color=#ce9178>'\0'</color>;
  printf<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ce9178>"%s"</color>,list<color=#ffd700>)</color>;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>
